thread.title: Jennifer Lopez looks incredible on romantic dinner date with new boyfriend Alex Rodriguez, as friend reveals "strong physical attraction" between them
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez looks incredible on romantic dinner date with new boyfriend Alex Rodriguez, as friend reveals "strong physical attraction" between them

author: Lara Martin
title: Jennifer Lopez looks incredible on romantic dinner date with new boyfriend Alex Rodriguez, as friend reveals "strong physical attraction" between them
text:
Jennifer Lopez looks incredible on romantic dinner date with new boyfriend Alex Rodriguez, as friend reveals "strong physical attraction" between them J.Lo is said to be romancing US baseball star Alex Rodriguez Share Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jennifer Lopez looked absolutely incredible this week as she enjoyed a romantic dinner date with new boyfriend Alex Rodriguez . 
The Jenny From The Block star slipped into a figure hugging white mini dress and skyscraper gold sandals for the couple’s visit to Casa Tua restaurant in Miami Beach. 
According to sources, the smitten pair stayed at the eatery for more than three hours before leaving accompanied by two female friends. 
Jennifer, 47, was first linked to former professional baseball star Alex, 41, earlier this month, following reports her brief flirtations with rapper Drake had fizzled out. J.Lo looked incredible in her white dress (Photo: XPUSDL) Alex left the eatery after Jennifer (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS) 
It’s thought J.Lo and Alex have been friendly for several years but it was only recently that blossomed into romance. 
A source told People magazine: “[They have a] strong physical attraction. She finds him very sexy and masculine.” 
"J.Lo and A-Rod are each happier in a relationship than playing the field,” added the insider. “He is fun and kind and she loves a strong man who works hard like she does. The partnership is perfect.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jennifer Lopez nearly slips out of her top during rehearsal Share this video Watch Next J.Lo recently returned from a Caribbean break with Alex (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS) 
And another source said Alex always admired Jennifer from afar: "A-Rod has always been taken with the beauty and personality of Jennifer Lopez. She is his dream girl.” 
So far, neither Jennifer or Alex, who flew to the Bahamas earlier this month for a romantic break in the sunshine, have spoken publicly about their relationship. 
The pair are believed to have started dating after bumping into each other at one of the singer's shows in Las Vegas last month, and are said to be taking things slow and just enjoying a "good light-hearted time" . Jennifer was previously linked to Drake (Photo: Splash News) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jennifer Lopez dances with mystery man after Drake spilt Share this video Watch Next 
A source recently explained: "This is very, very new. It's not serious at all. Jennifer is just dating. 
"Jennifer and Alex are both not looking for a relationship, just a good light-hearted time. They are on the exact same page." 
Last month, the actress and singer opened up about her dating life during an appearance on Ellen DeGeneres' show. 
She said: "First of all, stop! I don't date younger men. I don't think men have to be younger. It's not about that. I just meet people, and if I go out with them, I go out with them. Alex is a US baseball player (Photo: Getty Images North America) J.Lo said recently she doesn't just date younger men (Photo: Splash News) Read More Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez 'jet off to Bahamas for romantic holiday' 
"And if I like them, I like them, and if I don't, I don't. It's about the person, you know what I mean? It's about who they are. It has nothing to do with age! 
"There's this thing, because I dated Beau [her backing dancer Casper Smart], and he was younger, and he was the first guy I ever dated who was younger than me, but then I got labelled right away. 
"For me, it isn't [about age]. If they're older, they're older. If they're younger, they're younger. It depends on whether or not I'm attracted to their spirit, their soul, their whatever... their energy." J.Lo with ex boyfriend Casper Smart (Photo: WireImage) 
While speaking about her rumoured romance with Drake, she added: "We did a song together. We were not writing a song right at that moment. We were just hanging out. Actually he sent me a song that he wanted me to be on, and then I got on the song, and yeah, we have a song together." Like us on Facebook
